title.en: Senryaku Kekkon ~Karei Naru Kuzu na Hitobito~

altTitles.ja-ro: Senryaku Kekkon ~Karei Naru Kuzu na Hitobito~

altTitles.ja: 戦略結婚 ～華麗なるクズな人々～

description.en:
Mei, who left the countryside dreaming of becoming an idol, has become an underground idol below the bottom line at an unscrupulous agency. Riddled with debts and even more obscene hidden private photos being sold without permission, Mei climbs Tokyo Tower in the middle of the night in despair. Mei, in an attempt to make a show of herself before she dies, live-distributes a suicide video of herself throwing herself off the tower! A few years later, Mei, a diva suddenly appears in the entertainment world, dressed in a wedding dress at a lavish wedding reception celebrated by all of Japan. Who is she really?! And will she survive in the glamorous and scruffy world?! Plastic surgery, pillow fights, drugs, getting rich quick, foot dragging, and strategic marriage! The ugly and fierce competition for survival among the unprecedented bums is about to begin! 

(google translated)
